de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids.integer

Class IntegerDBIDRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids.integer.IntegerDBIDRange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStoreIDMap, ArrayDBIDs, ArrayStaticDBIDs, DBIDRange, DBIDs, IntegerDBIDs, SetDBIDs, StaticDBIDs

    final class IntegerDBIDRange
extends Object
implements IntegerDBIDs, DBIDRange, SetDBIDs
    Representing a DBID range allocation.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • binarySearch

        public int binarySearch(DBIDRef key)
        Description copied from interface: ArrayDBIDs
        Search for the position of the given key, assuming that the data set is sorted. For keys not found, -(1+insertion position) is returned, as for Java Collections.binarySearch(java.util.List<? extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>>, T)
        Specified by:
